description:
I was trying to launch 4 instances and I got the following bug related error.

Error: Unexpected API Error. Please report this at http://bugs.launchpad.net/nova/ and attach the Nova API log if possible. <class 'oslo_db.exception.DBDeadlock'> (HTTP 500) (Request-ID: req-b040cba1-3d89-46fd-bf84-7af8340bc6ec)

Error: Unable to launch 4 instances named "b1",

ime: 0.0004308

comments.content:
@BM Shukla:

Bug skimming result
===================
This bug report doesn't have enough information to do an analysis.
Please update the description and consider using a template [1] which
shows which information is needed.

I change the status of this report to "Incomplete". After you provided
the necessary information, please switch it back to "New".

If you have questions, I'm available in the IRC channel #openstack-nova
under the name "markus_z".

References
==========
[1] https://wiki.openstack.org/wiki/Nova/BugsTeam/BugReportTemplate
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~mzoeller

comments.content: [Expired for OpenStack Compute (nova) because there has been no activity for 60 days.]
